channel.title: Comments on: American Idol to burst into ball of irony

item.title: By: Eric Greenwood
item.dc:creator: Eric Greenwood
item.description: yeah, it was horrible. he sucks live. i thought it was hilarious that the judges bolted for that performance. they had to know that they wouldn't have been able to control their sour expressions during all those wildly missed notes.
item.content:encoded: yeah, it was horrible. he sucks live. i thought it was hilarious that the judges bolted for that performance. they had to know that they wouldn’t have been able to control their sour expressions during all those wildly missed notes.

item.title: By: AJW
item.dc:creator: AJW
item.description:
Oh my God, that was worse than I expected. He sounded awful, even with the Autotune.
Did you notice that the judges weren't there during his performance? I wonder if Kayne was behind that. Maybe Simon et al. knew what was good for them and their ears.
item.content:encoded:
Oh my God, that was worse than I expected. He sounded awful, even with the Autotune.

Did you notice that the judges weren’t there during his performance? I wonder if Kayne was behind that. Maybe Simon et al. knew what was good for them and their ears.

item.title: By: Erin Reed
item.dc:creator: Erin Reed
item.description: Right on Eric! Love this post.
